summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for transportation charges totaling $41.04. It details the services provided, including special handling charges and discounts applied, along with payment instructions and due date.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated March 25, 2002, and is for a total of $41.04.
The invoice includes transportation charges, a base discount, and special handling charges.
The payment is due by April 9, 2002.
The package was picked up on March 15, 2002, and delivered on March 11, 2002.
There is a mention of a delivery personnel named S. Smith.
